articles.title: NHS Free Vitamin D supply: The full list of people set to receive supplements this winter - Essex Live
articles.description: More than 2.5 million will be given the supplement
articles.content:
A number of people will receive free vitamin D supplements this winter from the NHS.
The government announced last week that people who were on the shielding list will receive a free supply.

articles.title: Dec 1 marks one-year anniversary of first confirmed COVID-19 patient in China - United News of India
articles.description: Moscow, Dec 1 (UNI) Exactly one year ago the first patient contracted what became known as the novel coronavirus in China''s Wuhan, triggering a global pandemic that has infected over 62 million people and killed more than 1.4 million as of Tuesday.

articles.title: No need for vaccines, Covid effectively over: Ex-Pfizer VP - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: While pharmaceutical major Pfizer had made headlines on the release of their Covid-19 vaccine, its former Vice President and Chief Scientist has said that there is no need for any vaccines to bring the pandemic to an end.
